message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for an exclusive introductory price of $110. Don't miss out on this opportunity to get a great deal!
Thanks for the offer, Alice! That's a pretty good price, but I was hoping to spend a bit less. Would you consider $100?
Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your feedback. In light of your offer, I am willing to consider $105 for the product. This is my final offer.
